dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1545 IH: To amend the definition of State in certain Federal agricultural laws to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the definition of State in certain Federal agricultural laws to include the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.

section.header: Inclusion of the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands as a state under certain federal agricultural laws

subsection.header: Amendment to the McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act
subsection.text: Section 8 of Public Law 87–788 (16 U.S.C. 582a–7; commonly known as the McIntire-Stennis Cooperative Forestry Act) is amended by striking and Guam. and inserting Guam, and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands..

subsection.header: Amendment to the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946
subsection.text: Section 207 of the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 (7 U.S.C. 1626) is amended by striking and Guam. and inserting , Guam, and the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands..
